body_en_uk:
Dear {{crafter_first_name}},

Thank you for starting a project on Sponsorcraft. You can view your project at {{project_preview_url}}.

After submitting your project, our moderation team will review your project and reply with feedback within 1 working day.

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

—
For advice and tips on crafting an awesome project, visit http://sponsorcraft.com/college/

 [[Edit your project]]
notes: Only send one reminder per crafter! Username if no first_name, last name.

body_en_uk:
Dear {{crafter_first_name}},

Thank you for submitting your project, {{project_name}}.

Our moderation team will review your project and reply with feedback within 1 working day.

It's a good idea to start planning the promotion of your project. There are some things you can do already, such as starting a Facebook page. Please view the attached Promotion Checklist, which is imperative to project success.

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

The project, {{project_name}}, was submitted.

You can view the project at {{project_preview_url}}.

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

Dear {{crafter_first_name}},

Thank you for submitting your project on Sponsorcraft. Our moderation team have reviewed your project and made the following suggestions. We do this for all projects to improve their chances of success.

Some suggestions are recommended and some are mandatory. When you are ready, just hit submit!

{{moderation_table}}

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

--
If you have any questions, please contact info@sponsorcraft.com.

Dear {{crafter_first_name}},

Your project, {{project_name}}, has been published! You can now receive pledges.

Good luck!

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

--
You can view your project at {{project_url}}.
You can manage your project's progress in your dashboard at {{dashboard_url}}.
You can view the Promotion Checklist at {{promotion_checklist_url}}.
New {{primary_category}} project! {{crafter_twitter_tag}} {{institution_twitter_tag}} {{project_url}}
notes: Geo location attached to tweet? {{insitution_twitter_tag}} will not exist for all institutions

body_en_uk:
Dear {{crafter_first_name}},

Your project, {{project_name}}, has been curated by {{curator}}! Your project now appears at {{curator_url}} where more Sponsors can see it.

If you would not like your project to be curated by this curator, email us at relations@sponsorcraft.com

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

subject_en_uk: You have received a curation request!
body_en_uk:
Dear {{curator}},

You have received a curation request from the project {{project_name}}.

You can view and respond to this request at {{curator_url}}.

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

Dear {{crafter_first_name}},

Here are some key statistics to show how your recent promotion helped your project last week:

{{date_a_week_yesterday}} to {{date_yesterday}}:
{{page_views}} page views
{{pledges_last_week}} pledges
£{{pledged_last_week}} pledged
{{percentage_raised_last_week}}% raised

You can view more detailed statistics in your dashboard at {{dashboard_url}}.

There are {{days_until_completion_date}} days until your project's completion date.

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.
notes: Send weekly counting backwards from completion date

subject_en_uk: A project you pledged to was cancelled
body_en_uk:
Dear {{sponsor_first_name}},

The project, {{project_name}}, has been cancelled. No money will change hands.

The Crafter of the project should be in contact with you shortly. You can view the project at {{project_url}}.

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

--
For more information, please visit the Sponsoring a project section of the FAQs: http://sponsorcraft.com/faq/sponsoring/.

subject_en_uk: A project you were following was cancelled
body_en_uk:

The project, {{project_name}}, has been cancelled.

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

Funds only change hands after its completion date if the project achieves its next milestone or funding target, or your pledge helped the project achieve a milestone. For more information, please visit the Sponsoring a project section of the FAQs: http://sponsorcraft.com/faq/sponsoring/.

Good luck reaching your next target!

subject_en_uk: Your project reached its completion date
body_en_uk:
Dear {{crafter_first_name}},

Your project, {{project_name}}, has reached its completion date but, sadly, has not achieved its first milestone so no funds will be transferred.

Please email your sponsors to thank them for their pledges. You can do this through your dashboard at {{dashboard_url}}.

If you would like to submit an improved or new project we would be delighted to help.

Thank you for using Sponsorcraft. We are constantly trying to improve our service and would love your feedback. Please go to {{questionnaire url}} to let us know your thoughts.

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

subject_en_uk: A project you are following reached its completion date
body_en_uk:

subject_en_uk: A project you are following reached its completion date
body_en_uk:
Dear {{sponsor_first_name}},

The project, {{project_name}}, reached its completion date and achieved its {{1st milestone/2nd milestone}}. All donations before this milestone will be processed. As you pledged after this milestone, your pledge will not be processed.

You can view the project at {{project_url}}.

Many thanks!

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

--
For more information, please visit the Sponsoring a project section of the FAQs: http://sponsorcraft.com/faq/sponsoring/.

Dear {{crafter_first_name}},

Congratulations! Your project, {{project_name}}, reached its {{1st milestone/2nd milestone/funding target}}!

We will process your pledges within 1 working day.

Thank you for using Sponsorcraft. We are constantly trying to improve our service and would love your feedback. Please go to {{questionnaire url}} to let us know your thoughts.

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

subject_en_uk: A project you are following was successful!
body_en_uk:
Dear {{follower_first_name}},

The project, {{project_name}}, achieved its funding target! You can view the project at {{project_url}}.

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

Dear {{crafter_first_name}},

Your pledges have been processed for the project, {{project_name}}.

Total pledges: {{pledges}}
pledges_successfully processed: {{pledges_successful}}

(If any failures: {{pledges_failed}} pledges_failed due to a problem with the Sponsor(s) PayPal account. This can be for a number of reasons. We have contacted the relevant Sponsor(s) in order to resolve the issues. We will endeavour to resolve these pledges for 1 month. We will contact you then with our progress.)

Please email your Sponsors to thank them for their donations and let them know when they can expect to receive their rewards. You can do this through your dashboard at {{Dasboard url}}.

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

subject_en_uk: A project you pledged to was successful!

The project, {{project_name}}, reached its completion date and achieved its {{1st milestone/2nd milestone/funding target}}! You can view the project at {{project_url}}.

Your pledge of £{{pledge_amount}} to {{project_name}} was successfully processed. 

Many thanks!

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

--
For more information, please visit the Sponsoring a project section of the FAQs: http://sponsorcraft.com/faq/sponsoring/.

Dear {{sponsor_first_name}},

The project, {{project_name}}, reached its completion date and achieved its {{1st milestone/2nd milestone/funding target}}!.

Your pledge of £{{pledge_amount}} failed during processing. This can happen if you haven't entered your card details in your PayPal account, your card expires, you cancel the pre-approval agreement, or for a number of other reasons.

Please visit {{payment_url}} to view your pledge and to retry the transaction. Your crafter needs you!

Many thanks!

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

--
You can view the project at {{project_url}}
For more information, please visit the Sponsoring a project section of the FAQs: http://sponsorcraft.com/faq/sponsoring/.

Your pledge of £{{pledge_amount}} failed during processing. This can happen if you haven't entered your card details in your PayPal account, your card expires, you cancel the pre-approval agreement, or for a number of other reasons.
